message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a deep learning-based method for text detection in scene images, which is a common problem in computer vision and image processing. The paper focuses on improving the accuracy of text instance prediction, which is a key aspect of scene text detection. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes novel loss functions and techniques for training the model, which are related to machine learning and optimization. Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely categories. The paper also evaluates the proposed method on public benchmarks, which is related to information retrieval and evaluation. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another possible category. Finally, the paper deals with text analysis and processing, which is related to natural language processing and computational linguistics. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a possible category.
